Jx.Fieldset

Extends: Jx.Widget

This class represents a fieldset.  It can be used to group fields together.

Example

License

Summary
Jx.FieldsetExtends: Jx.Widget
Options
legendThe text for the legend of a fieldset. 
idThe id to assign to this element
fieldsetClassA CSS class to assign to the fieldset. 
legendClassA CSS class to assign to the legend. 
templatea template for how this element should be rendered
formThe Jx.Form that this fieldset should be added to
Functions
renderCreates a fieldset.
addAdds fields to this fieldset
addTo



Options



legend
The text for the legend of a fieldset.  Default is null or no legend.



id
The id to assign to this element



fieldsetClass
A CSS class to assign to the fieldset.  Useful for custom styling of the element



legendClass
A CSS class to assign to the legend.  Useful for custom styling of the element



template
a template for how this element should be rendered



form
The Jx.Form that this fieldset should be added to



Functions



render
render : function ()
Creates a fieldset.



add
add : function ()
Adds fields to this fieldset
Parameters
pass as many fields to this method as you like.  They should be Jx.Field objects



addTo
addTo: function(what)









Base class for all widgets (visual classes) in the JxLib Framework.
